DOC.brief_summary: Periocular blockade with 12.5 mm needle is as effective as block with 25 mm needle for patients undergoing Pars Plana Vitrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Anesthesia for Pars Plana Vitrectomy (PPV) With Insulin Needle
DOC.detailed_description: The author wants to see the effect of short needle in patients undergoing retinal surgery.
